resp = client.search(
    query={
        "match_all": {}
    },
    script_fields={
        "test1": {
            "script": {
                "lang": "painless",
                "source": "doc['price'].value * 2"
            }
        },
        "test2": {
            "script": {
                "lang": "painless",
                "source": "doc['price'].value * params.factor",
                "params": {
                    "factor": 2
                }
            }
        }
    },
)
print(resp)
